commitResults.messageTitle: Level 1. Implemented a skeletal version of McBot, previously known as Duke.
Level 2. Added the ability to store text entered by the user and list it back.
Added a Task class and option to mark tasks as done or change it back to undone.
Add support for tracking three types of tasks: 1. Todo - task without dates 2. Deadline - task with a due date/time 3. Event - task with a start and end time
Modified input.txt to input each type of tasks, mark and unmark operations. Modified EXPECTED.TXT to have the expected output.
Level-5. Added error handling in McBot by using McBotException class. Updated input and expected text files to test all possible error
Level-6. Added support for deleting tasks from the list. Modified input and expected text for testing of deletion
Add invalidCommandException.java and minor refactoring of the codes.

commitResults.messageBody:
Users now able to save their tasks list in a text file whenever the task list changes. The same file is loaded when McBot is started

Refactored redundant methods in ToDo, Deadline and Event classes. Utilise toString method to print out the task details.

Add toDataString in Task type classes for consistent formatting when saving into data text file.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add date and time field for Deadline and Event classes.
commitResults.messageBody: The date field must be filled while time is optional.

commitResults.messageTitle: Revert "Add date and time field for Deadline and Event classes."
Add date and time field for Deadline and Event classes.
commitResults.messageBody: The date field must be filled while time is optional.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug in saving and loading time aspect of Deadline and Event tasks
commitResults.messageBody: Time field was not saved into the text file, neither could it load properly.

By extracting Ui, Storage, Parser and TaskList classes from McBot class, more OOP can be used in this iP. More OOP != good OOP

Edit input and expected text files so it can test the new commands and errors thrown.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add mcbot package which is further divided into task and exception packages.
commitResults.messageBody:
Refactor invalidCommandException.java to InvalidCommandException.java

Edit runtest.sh so it will work with the packages

commitResults.messageTitle: Add test folder and files to test Task and ToDo classes through junit testing
Add Java documentation to the each type of Tasks, Exceptions and Storage files.
Tweak the code to comply with a coding standard
